text_logic_form: Find the length of the line $QM$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: Find the length of the line $QM$.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $QP$ is $4x-8$.
The length of the line $QM$ is $2x+2$.
The line $PN$ is perpendicular to the line $PQ$.
The line $MQ$ is perpendicular to the line $MN$.
The measure of angle $MNQ$ is equal to the measure of angle $QNP$.
line_instances: There are lines $MB$, $NA$, $NB$, $NC$, $NM$, $NP$, $NQ$, $PA$, $QC$, $QM$, and $QP$ in the diagram.
